name: Turtle Rock
description: Turtle Rock is a stunning rock formation located in Joshua Tree National Park, California. It is a popular spot for hikers and rock climbers, offering breathtaking views of the desert landscape.

name: Silver Salmon Creek
park: Lake Clark National Park and Preserve
description: Silver Salmon Creek is a serene lake located in Lake Clark National Park and Preserve, Alaska. It is known for its pristine wilderness and opportunities for wildlife viewing, including salmon runs and bear sightings.

name: Chilkoot Trail
park: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park
description: Chilkoot Trail is a historic mountain trail located in Skagway, Alaska. It is a part of Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park and offers a glimpse into the gold rush era with stunning mountain scenery.

name: St. Mary Lake
description: St. Mary Lake is a picturesque lake located in Glacier National Park, Montana. It is known for its crystal-clear waters, surrounded by towering mountains, and is a favorite destination for hikers and photographers.

name: Twin Lake
park: Lake Clark National Park and Preserve
description: Twin Lake is a tranquil lake nestled in the wilderness of Lake Clark National Park and Preserve, Alaska. It is a perfect spot for camping and fishing, surrounded by pristine nature.

name: Lake McDonald
description: Lake McDonald is a stunning mountain lake located in Glacier National Park, Montana. It is famous for its emerald-green waters and is a popular spot for boating and hiking.

name: Charley Rivers
description: Charley Rivers is a pristine river located in Charley Rivers National Preserve, Alaska. It is known for its remote wilderness and excellent fishing opportunities, making it a paradise for outdoor enthusiasts.
